result.html: cé as thú a mháirtínWhere are you from, Máirtín?
result.ponchtml: cé as ṫú a ṁáirtínWhere are you from, Máirtín?

result.eng: Maybe you can play ping-pong (table tennis) in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain.
